. I will be there for several minutes. Please call or text %1$s for further information. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you for your cooperation.

Hi! Dear %1$s, this is %2$s with Sunshire Shuttles. May I confirm your address with %3$s ? You are more than welcome to either reply this message or call/text %4$s for further information. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you for your cooperation.

Hi! Dear %1$s, this is %2$s with Sunshire Shuttles. May I request an update of your location? We have a difficulty to find the exact location of you. You are more than welcome to either reply this message or call/text %3$s for further information. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you for your cooperation."

Hi! Dear %1$s, this is %2$s with Sunshire Shuttles. I am honored to serve you today. Right now, I am at the gate of your community. May I request your gate #? You are more than welcome to either reply this message or call/text %3$s for further information. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you for your cooperation.

Hi! Dear %1$s, this is %2$s with Sunshire Shuttles. I am honored to serve you today. Right now, I am at the gate of your house/apartment. I am wondering if you need any help? I\'ve already waited you for 10 minutes. According to the service condition, the maximum wait time is 15 minutes. You may be charged extra money for the delay. You are more than welcome to either reply this message or call/text %3$s for further information. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you for your cooperation.
